## buildObject() function

Builds the object associated with the given technique.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function buildObject(technique: Technique, geometry: THREE.BufferGeometry, material: THREE.Material | THREE.Material[], tile: Tile, elevationEnabled: boolean): THREE.Object3D;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  technique | [Technique](./harp-datasource-protocol.technique.md) | The technique. |
|  geometry | THREE.BufferGeometry | The object's geometry. |
|  material | THREE.Material \| THREE.Material\[\] | The object's material. |
|  tile | [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) | The tile where the object is located. |
|  elevationEnabled | boolean | True if elevation is enabled, false otherwise. |

<b>Returns:</b>

THREE.Object3D
